Certainly! Here are some other day trip options from Bilbao that you might enjoy:

1. Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve - This natural reserve is a great place to see diverse wildlife, lush greenery, and beautiful landscapes.

2. Basque Coast Geopark - Spanning over 13 kilometers, this geopark offers a stunning coastal walk, amazing geological sites, and fantastic scenery.

3. Gernika - A historical town located around 30 minutes from Bilbao. It is famous for the bombing that took place in 1937 during the Spanish Civil War which inspired Picasso's painting.

4. Sopelana Beach - This long sandy beach is a great place to relax, surf, and enjoy some sun.

5. Santander - A beautiful coastal city with plenty of things to offer. Here, you can enjoy city life, visit historical sites, and go to beaches.

All of these locations would be great choices for day trips from Bilbao, and they all offer something special and unique, which will make your day trip a memorable experience!
